entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow. Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
